    1. update(World)

Interface IWorldObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
IWorldObserverTest, ParserWorldObserver
public interface IWorldObserver
A class can implement this interface when it wants to be informed of changes in World objects.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    update(World world)
    This method is called whenever the observed World object is changed.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(World world)
      This method is called whenever the observed World object is changed. A reference to the changed world is passed as a parameter
      Parameters:
      world - the changed world object.
